question: can you plz confirm the following hadith. Rasulullah S.A.W. said "if you read the kalima with conviction Jannah becomes upon you "
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
This is the meaning of various authentic Ahaadith.

Some mention that the recitor will enter Jannah and other narrations mention that he will be saved from the fire of hell. (refer al-Targheeb vol.2 pg.412-418; Majma-uz-zawaaid vol.7 pg.205)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
